query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4C7dh5n6yXuaUbo.root --database Un9ncnuBxgCCtamkr3qHdr --execute SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users';
stdout:
column_name	data_type
id	int
openId	varchar
name	text
email	varchar
loginMethod	varchar
role	enum
createdAt	timestamp
updatedAt	timestamp
lastSignedIn	timestamp
username	varchar
passwordHash	varchar
status	enum
